name: Filament Temperature Cheat Sheet
listing_title: Filament Temperature Cheat Sheet - Print Settings for 6 Common Materials
listing_description:
Stop guessing your print settings. This one-page cheat sheet gives you the exact nozzle temps, bed temps, speeds, and cooling settings for PLA, PETG, ABS, TPU, ASA, and Nylon. Color-coded by difficulty. Print it out and stick it next to your printer.

Includes tuning tips, storage reminders, and a pre-print checklist. Works with any FDM printer and any slicer.
bullet_points: Nozzle and bed temperatures for 6 popular filament types
Print speed and cooling fan settings for each material
Color-coded by difficulty so you know what you're getting into
Tuning tips: how to adjust temps based on what you see
Storage reminders so your filament stays dry and printable
Print-friendly single page, fits right next to your printer
